subject: Sales
title: The Trial Close
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Trial Close.

hook.text: Halfway through a pitch, the rep asks 'Does this sound like what you need?' It's a test, not a close.

buildup.text: Trial closes are temperature checks. They measure readiness without the pressure of a final ask.

discovery.text: A yes to a trial question means confidence to close. A no means time to pivot before it's too late.

twist.text: Many sellers skip this and go for the hard close. They crash because they never tested the runway.

climax.text: Sprinkle trial closes throughout the conversation. They provide real-time data on buyer readiness.

punchline.text: Test the water before you dive in.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of a trial close?
options: To check buyer readiness without committing to a final ask
